Scroll breaker

Process

Modern-day online and on-device experiences can be, as discussed in this post, addictive. As discussed in this post, we can, however, improve these technologies from an individual and group perspective. In particular, we can improve our awareness and intentionality with respect to technology use. To this end, I have created a collection of accounts that prompt us to do so. The prompts are inspired by the thought "is this what I want to be doing right now?" Their variations are generated programmatically with the help of a Large Language Model.

Acknowledgments: ChatGPT (OpenAI)

Influences: Fear by Thich Nhat Hanh, work by Jonathan Haidt, research by Jonathan Stray
